title: Griswell's Station
text:
Griswell's or Griswell's Station was a <a href="stagecoach">stagecoach</a> station of the <a href="Butterfield%20Overland%20Mail">Butterfield Overland Mail</a> located along the <a href="Gila%20River">Gila River</a> in Arizona. It was located 12 miles east of <a href="Peterman%27s%20Station">Peterman's Station</a> and 15 miles west of <a href="Agua%20Caliente%2C%20Arizona">Flap Jack Ranch</a> Station.
Griswell's location is in <a href="Yuma%20County%2C%20Arizona">Yuma County, Arizona</a> at (NAD83) and at an elevation of MSL. It can be seen on the USGS 1:24K topographic map Horn, AZ.
